cards.title: A UK current account
cards.text: We're a fully licensed UK bank, which means we're regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority.

cards.title: Protection for your money
cards.text: Your eligible deposits in Monzo are protected by The Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) up to a value of £85,000 per person.

cards.title: A new way to bank
cards.text: With features like instant spending notifications, simple ways to send money, Pots for separating it and monthly spending summaries.

cards.title: Friendly support
cards.text: Got a problem? We're here to help. Just message us in the app.

cards.title: Loans and overdrafts
cards.text: We offer loans up to £25,000 and overdrafts up to £2,000. You can check if you're eligible without affecting your credit score.

cards.title: Interest on your savings
cards.text: Earn interest on your savings by choosing an easy access or fixed term Pot. Your money with the savings provider is protected by the FSCS for amounts up to £85,000. Minimum £10 deposit to open.
